text: Ski Stadion is a multi-use stadium in Ski, Norway. It is currently used for track and field meets hosted by Ski IL and for association football matches, being the home ground of Follo FK. ==External links== * *Ski Stadion - Nordic Stadiums Category:Football venues in Norway Category:Athletics (track and field) venues in Norway Category:Sports venues in Viken Category:Ski, Norway
title: Ski Stadion
